full_summary:
## Title: Life Cycle Management Specialists for Department of National Defence (DND)

### Tender Details

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01027031  
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-TSPS2022-15/A  
**Publication Date:** February 22, 2023  
**Tender Closing Date:** March 27, 2023 at 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)  
**Expected Contract Start/End Dates:** March 10, 2023 – February 28, 2026 (plus 2 option years)

### Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the services of three (3) Junior (level 1) Life Cycle Management Specialists for the Directorate of Aerospace Equipment Program Management (Fighters & Trainers). The successful bidders will provide support services for 240 days per year, including task and solution professional services (TSPS). The estimated contract duration is for three (3) years, with two (2) irrevocable option years.

**Location of Work**

* Region(s): National Capital Region (NCR)
* Specific Location(s): 455 Boulevard de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC

**Security Requirements**

* Security Clearance: FSC – Secret
* Document Safeguarding: None

**Required Services**

* Life Cycle Management Specialists will provide services for:
	+ Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services (GSIN R008A)
	+ Life Cycle Management (Tier 1: < $3.75 M)

**Pre-Qualified Suppliers**

Only suppliers pre-qualified under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) method of supply will be invited to submit a proposal. The list of pre-qualified suppliers includes:

ACF Associates Inc.  
ADGA Group Consultants Inc.  
Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc.  
Arup Canada Inc.  
... (continued list of 19 suppliers)

### Contact Information

* DND Point of Contact: Tony Seng  
* Email: tony.seng@forces.gc.ca

### Instructions to Suppliers

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly to qualified suppliers.
* Suppliers are advised that RFP documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System.

### Important Notes

* Bidders are advised that RFP documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System.
